entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:05 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
